page.title: 01TENTERDEN
page.content: Tenterden is a country town with a population of over 6000 people. During the day it is very busy as people from round about come to the shops.The car parks are very expensive so there are always lots of cars parked in the streets which makes it difficult to cross the road.The traffic warden is always busy in Tenterden.There is only one safe place to cross the main road in Tenterden and that is the Pelican Crossing near the church,and although we have a lollipop lady at the end of the school road in the morning and after school, at other times it is difficult to cross the road and you have to be careful and use your Green Cross Code. Our church is called St.Mildred's it's tower and clock can be seen from all over the town.The church was started in the 12th century but the tower was built in the 15th.
